thread.title: Census Bureau: Income, Poverty, and Health Insurance Products
thread.title_full: Census Bureau: Income, Poverty, and Health Insurance Products - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Census Bureau: Income, Poverty, and Health Insurance Products
text:
U.S. Census Bureau
WASHINGTON , Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- The Census Bureau is releasing a selection of data products on income, poverty and health insurance coverage. These products include:
2015 Current Population Survey Annual Social and Economic Supplement Public Use Micro Data File containing tax and noncash benefit variables ( http://www.census.gov/hhes/povmeas/data/supplemental/public-use.html ) 2015 CPS ASEC updated in Table Creator online tool ( http://www.census.gov/cps/data/cpstablecreator.html ) 2015 CPS ASEC Supplemental Poverty Measure Research File ( http://www.census.gov/hhes/povmeas/data/public-use.html ) 2014 National Academy of Science (NAS) based poverty tables updated using the 2015 CPS ASEC - experimental poverty measures based on recommendations of the 1995 NAS report "Measuring Poverty" ( http://www.census.gov/hhes/povmeas/data/nas/tables/2014/index.html ) No news release associated with these products. Tip Sheet only.
Public Information Office
301-763-3030 / pio@census.gov
census.gov
